description:
The Morning Star speaks to Ellee. It is revealed that the Morning Star was Elleelain all along and has been watching over Sora and the gang. Then, she gives the last of her power to Ellee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good-bye, Morning Star! The Princess Awakens!
さよなら一番星! プリンセスのめざめ!
